speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: ACT I

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: SCENE I. An apartment in the DUKE'S palace.

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO, ESCALUS, Lords and Attendants

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Escalus.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: My lord.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Of government the properties to unfold,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Would seem in me to affect speech and discourse;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Since I am put to know that your own science

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exceeds, in that, the lists of all advice

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: My strength can give you: then no more remains,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But that to your sufficiency as your Worth is able,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And let them work. The nature of our people,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Our city's institutions, and the terms

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For common justice, you're as pregnant in

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: As art and practise hath enriched any

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That we remember. There is our commission,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: From which we would not have you warp. Call hither,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I say, bid come before us Angelo.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit an Attendant

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What figure of us think you he will bear?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For you must know, we have with special soul

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Elected him our absence to supply,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Lent him our terror, dress'd him with our love,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And given his deputation all the organs

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Of our own power: what think you of it?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: If any in Vienna be of worth

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: To undergo such ample grace and honour,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: It is Lord Angelo.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Look where he comes.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter ANGELO

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Always obedient to your grace's will,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: I come to know your pleasure.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Angelo,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: There is a kind of character in thy life,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That to the observer doth thy history

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Fully unfold. Thyself and thy belongings

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Are not thine own so proper as to waste

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thyself upon thy virtues, they on thee.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Heaven doth with us as we with torches do,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Not light them for themselves; for if our virtues

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Did not go forth of us, 'twere all alike

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: As if we had them not. Spirits are not finely touch'd

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But to fine issues, nor Nature never lends

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The smallest scruple of her excellence

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But, like a thrifty goddess, she determines

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Herself the glory of a creditor,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Both thanks and use. But I do bend my speech

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To one that can my part in him advertise;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Hold therefore, Angelo:--

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: In our remove be thou at full ourself;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Mortality and mercy in Vienna

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Live in thy tongue and heart: old Escalus,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Though first in question, is thy secondary.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Take thy commission.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Now, good my lord,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Let there be some more test made of my metal,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Before so noble and so great a figure

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Be stamp'd upon it.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: No more evasion:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: We have with a leaven'd and prepared choice

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Proceeded to you; therefore take your honours.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Our haste from hence is of so quick condition

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That it prefers itself and leaves unquestion'd

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Matters of needful value. We shall write to you,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: As time and our concernings shall importune,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: How it goes with us, and do look to know

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What doth befall you here. So, fare you well;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To the hopeful execution do I leave you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Of your commissions.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Yet give leave, my lord,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: That we may bring you something on the way.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: My haste may not admit it;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Nor need you, on mine honour, have to do

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: With any scruple; your scope is as mine own

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: So to enforce or qualify the laws

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: As to your soul seems good. Give me your hand:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I'll privily away. I love the people,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But do not like to stage me to their eyes:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Through it do well, I do not relish well

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Their loud applause and Aves vehement;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Nor do I think the man of safe discretion

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That does affect it. Once more, fare you well.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: The heavens give safety to your purposes!

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Lead forth and bring you back in happiness!

speaker: DUKE
text_entry: I thank you. Fare you well.

speaker: DUKE
text_entry: Exit

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I shall desire you, sir, to give me leave

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: To have free speech with you; and it concerns me

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: To look into the bottom of my place:

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: A power I have, but of what strength and nature

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I am not yet instructed.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: 'Tis so with me. Let us withdraw together,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And we may soon our satisfaction have

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Touching that point.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I'll wait upon your honour.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Exeunt
